DataElement.preferredName: Hearing Impairment Self-Report Personal Medical History Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field used to describe the patient-reported hearing problems.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hearing Impairment Self-Report Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Partial or complete loss of the ability to detect or understand sounds resulting from damage to the outer, middle, or inner ear structures. Causes include exposure to loud noise, ear infections, injuries to the ear, genetic, and congenital disorders._An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information._A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Partial or complete loss of the ability to detect or understand sounds resulting from damage to the outer, middle, or inner ear structures. Causes include exposure to loud noise, ear infections, injuries to the ear, genetic, and congenital disorders.

Concepts.definition: Partial or complete loss of the ability to detect or understand sounds resulting from damage to the outer, middle, or inner ear structures. Causes include exposure to loud noise, ear infections, injuries to the ear, genetic, and congenital disorders.

Property.preferredDefinition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation  of an event or information.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.
